text: Possible helpful thoughts to the community here Well I ve had my own bout with a suicide attempt trying to OD  Of course it failed and I m still here  The attempt made me throw up green stomach acid for   hours   and it raised my liver enzymes from   to   or so I know how some of you feel so trapped in a dark place with no escape  I also won t be one of those people saying it ll be better if you don t because I know how hard it is Just remember it s  the darkest just before dawn I still have thoughts of suicide but after that attempt I have a better appreciation for life A couple helpful thoughts that help me overcome this problem is  Write all of your feelings in a journal before you act on anything  This will help get your emotions out so they aren t all bottled up inside waiting to explode  Seek help  here or a therapist  I m seeing one right now and it s really helpful  And yes  it s normally doctor patient confidentiality  See your family doctor and tell them that you are depressed  One medication that helped me  even better than Xanax is  Escitalopram  Heck  you see it here  If you see someone in a similar situation try and help them or talk with them  Perhaps you can both help each other I just hope that everyone going through these dark times will reconsider suicide Best wishes and prayers sent to all  And a special thanks to all of those here trying to help Damn it  I m getting teary eyed writing this
summary: There was a suicide attempt in the community. The attempt made him throw up green stomach acid for hours and raised his liver enzymes. He still has thoughts of suicide, but now he has a better appreciation for life. He recommends writing down your feelings in a journal and seeing a therapist. He also recommends seeing your family doctor.
cleaned: suicide attempt community attempt throw green stomach acid hour raise liver enzyme thought suicide well appreciation life recommend write feeling journal see therapist recommend see family doctor

text: Tips to pulling an all nighter I know y all like staying up all night  It s fun  You get to play video games and stuff  So from a person who s had some experience  here s some advice    Never look at the time  If you look at the time and you see it s later than you normally stay up  your body will get pretty tired    Always have food or drink to give you energy  That s the nature of food  It gives you energy   Do NOT drink energy drinks  or caffeine unless it s the tail end of your all nighter  They will make you tired after they wear off  I d recommend things like water or protein shakes to drink instead    Have something to distract you from your tiredness  You re gonna be tired  but if you distract yourself  you won t notice  Watching action movies or playing video games are some things you can do  If you re studying for a test or doing homework  have music that will keep you awake    Don t try too hard  Effort makes you tired  Just chill and act like this is your standard routine   And with that are my four tips  Feel free to criticize them or add your own in the comments
summary: According to a person who's had some experience, never look at the time when you're going to stay up all night. Always have food or drink to give you energy. Don't drink energy drinks or caffeine unless it's the tail end of an all-night stay. Have something to distract you from your tiredness.
cleaned: accord person experience look time go stay night food drink energy not drink energy drink caffeine tail end night stay distract tiredness

text: Don t want to exist anymoreMy post is probably nothing different from the others here but it scares me that so many people feel the same way  If I talk to any for   minutes  I know I will find out something about them that will convince me that they deserve to live and be happy  But why is it that we can t do that for ourselves  Why can t we love ourselves  We would never let our friends be harsh on themselves but we re the worst to ourselves  To the point where we spend night after night wanting to end our existence  I don t want to be myself anymore  I don t want to live  But I m too scared to do anything about it  I have no motivation or drive for anything in life  Nothing excites me  death seems like the only answer  I write this as I cry uncontrollably in the middle of the night  waiting for this to be over
